column5: *Dynamic Inventory* - INQUIRE FIRST- *There maybe a cleaning fee of $95 if the booking request is for 5 days or less.* Three Bedroom: King in master, two full beds in second, king in third bedroom and sleeper sofa in living area. Unit has an electric fireplace. Maximum occupancy is 10. High season rates are higher than whats listed on the calendar; Weekends : $360/night Weekday : $260/night The current rate on the calendar will be valid if the booking request is within 5 days of arrival .
